description: Western North Carolina, where the musician and most of his bandmates are from, experienced severe flooding and destruction
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Pink Floyd Sell Music and Likeness Rights to Sony for $400 Million
description: Long in the works, the deal includes rights to the band’s recordings, branding, and theatrical rights, though songwriting rights remain in control of the members
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Mo Troper Settles Defamation Lawsuit Against Ex-Partner Who Accused Him of Abuse
description: The Portland power-pop artist had taken legal action against his former partner, Dove Stoner, after their abuse allegations preceded him being dropped by Lame-O Records
author: Matthew Strauss

title: Dean & Britta and Sonic Boom Announce Holiday Album, Share Video for New Song: Watch
description: Their cover of Willie Nelson’s “Pretty Paper” leads the collaborative full-length A Peace of Us
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Bruce Springsteen & The E Street Band Add 2025 European Tour Dates
description: Shows in the United Kingdom and mainland Europe will follow this year’s Canadian run
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Helena Hauff Announces Multiply Your Absurdities EP, Shares New Video: Watch
description: “Humanoid Fruit” leads the German producer’s first album in six years and Tresor debut
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Faye Webster Shares Video for New Song “After the First Kiss”: Watch
description: In the clip, directed by Kyle Ng, Webster dresses up as a goblin for a medieval LARPing event
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Sam Smith Joins Beverly Glenn-Copeland on New Version of “Ever New”: Listen
description: The musicians and producer Rob Moose updated the Keyboard Fantasies track for the Red Hot Organization’s new Transa compilation
author: Matthew Strauss

title: Ela Minus Announces New Album, Shares Video for New Song “Broken”: Watch
description: The Colombian musician will release sophomore effort Dia in the winter
author: Walden Green

title: Mdou Moctar Re-Record Funeral for Justice for New Album, Share Song: Listen
description: The Nigerien band played acoustic and traditional instruments on the new version of the 2024 album
author: Matthew Strauss

title: The Weather Station Announces New Album Humanhood, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
description: “Neon Signs” leads Tamara Lindeman’s follow-up to Ignorance and How Is It That I Should Look at the Stars
author: Walden Green

title: Mount Eerie Shares New Song “I Saw Another Bird”: Listen
description: The latest preview of Phil Elverum’s new album
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Gang of Four to Say Farewell Again With 2025 Tour
description: Each night will consist of two sets, including a full-album performance of Entertainment!
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Ms. Lauryn Hill, Sued by Pras Over Fugees Tour Chaos, Calls Lawsuit “Baseless”
description: Pras alleges that his longtime bandmate shorted the band on live income, as well as rejecting and dropping out of lucrative shows
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Broken Social Scene Share Trailer for New Documentary It’s All Gonna Break: Watch
description: Directed by Stephen Chung, the film documents the early years of the Canadian band and the creation of its first three albums
author: Nina Corcoran
